title: Driving Under Influence
description: Do not drive under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.

title: Sudden Braking
description: Avoid sudden braking in heavy traffic.
detailedDescription: Sudden braking can cause rear-end collisions, especially in heavy traffic. Always maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead to allow for gradual and predictable braking.

title: Speed
description: Follow speed limits posted on road signs.
detailedDescription: Speed limits are enforced to ensure safety for all road users. Adhering to these limits helps prevent accidents and allows drivers sufficient reaction time to unexpected events.

detailedDescription: Sudden braking can cause rear-end collisions, especially in heavy traffic. Always maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead to allow for gradual and predictable braking.

title: Driving Under Influence
description: Do not drive under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.

description: Follow speed limits posted on road signs.

detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.

title: Bus Priority
description: Yield to buses when they signal to merge back into traffic.
detailedDescription: Buses are a vital part of public transportation. Yielding to them when they signal ensures smoother traffic flow and prevents unnecessary delays for public commuters.

title: Driving Abilities
description: Always drive within your abilities and the road conditions.
detailedDescription: Adjust your driving based on your experience, skill level, and current road conditions such as rain, snow, or heavy traffic. Overestimating your abilities can lead to dangerous situations.

detailedDescription: Adjust your driving based on your experience, skill level, and current road conditions such as rain, snow, or heavy traffic. Overestimating your abilities can lead to dangerous situations.

title: Speed
description: Follow speed limits posted on road signs.
detailedDescription: Speed limits are enforced to ensure safety for all road users. Adhering to these limits helps prevent accidents and allows drivers sufficient reaction time to unexpected events.

title: Bus Priority
description: Yield to buses when they signal to merge back into traffic.
detailedDescription: Buses are a vital part of public transportation. Yielding to them when they signal ensures smoother traffic flow and prevents unnecessary delays for public commuters.

title: Sudden Braking
description: Avoid sudden braking in heavy traffic.
detailedDescription: Sudden braking can cause rear-end collisions, especially in heavy traffic. Always maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead to allow for gradual and predictable braking.

title: Driving Under Influence
description: Do not drive under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.

detailedDescription: Sudden braking can cause rear-end collisions, especially in heavy traffic. Always maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead to allow for gradual and predictable braking.

title: Driving Abilities
description: Always drive within your abilities and the road conditions.
detailedDescription: Adjust your driving based on your experience, skill level, and current road conditions such as rain, snow, or heavy traffic. Overestimating your abilities can lead to dangerous situations.

title: Bus Priority
description: Yield to buses when they signal to merge back into traffic.
detailedDescription: Buses are a vital part of public transportation. Yielding to them when they signal ensures smoother traffic flow and prevents unnecessary delays for public commuters.

title: Driving Abilities
description: Always drive within your abilities and the road conditions.
detailedDescription: Adjust your driving based on your experience, skill level, and current road conditions such as rain, snow, or heavy traffic. Overestimating your abilities can lead to dangerous situations.

title: Driving Under Influence
description: Do not drive under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
detailedDescription: Driving while intoxicated impairs judgment, reaction times, and coordination, significantly increasing the risk of accidents. It is not only dangerous but also illegal in most jurisdictions.
